meanings.sent1: The reflexologists gently massaged my feet to help me relax.
meanings.sent2: The reflexologists in the spa are trained to work on pressure points in the feet.
meanings.sent3: The reflexologists joked that they could feel my stress melting away with each touch.
meanings.sent4: The reflexologists were like wizards, using their hands to unlock hidden energy pathways.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the soothing touch of the reflexologists during my session.

meanings.sent1: We invited the reflexologists to give a presentation at the wellness fair.
meanings.sent2: The reflexologists' schedules were fully booked for the entire week.
meanings.sent3: The reflexologists gathered for a group photo after a successful event.
meanings.sent4: The reflexologists stood out in their matching uniforms, ready to assist.
meanings.sent5: The reflexologists' expertise was evident in the positive feedback from clients.
